description:
Sunny and large spot in a wonderful part of Brooklyn! 2 minutes walk from the G train.

The Space:

Clean, Comfortable, Bright, Spacious

Great for a single traveler or couples

Vintage Decor, Queen Size Bed, Really comfortable couch, Air Conditioners

Spacious Kitchen with plenty of workspace, fast Wifi, Big desk, Closet Space!!

Recently renovated, Piano

Fun up and coming Neighborhood. Lots of great Restaurants, Bars and Cafes. Close to C and G trains, 15 minutes to Williamsburg, 20 minutes to Manhattan

Thanks for looking!!
Michael

So many great bars, coffee shops and restaurants!

There are 2 excellent bars right around the corner on Bedford Avenue: Do or Die and Dynaco. Make a right out of the apartment and your first right onto Bedford Avenue.

The Playhouse is perfect for a morning coffee and pastry. It's on Bedford Avenue right next to Dynaco.

Some of the best pizza in the city is at Soeedy Romeos. Make a left out of the apartment, walk 2 blocks to Classon Avenue, and make a right

To get to the G train: make a right out the door, a left at the first corner into Bedford Avenue, and walk 3 blocks.

To get to the C train: make a left out the door, a left at the first corner, onto Franklin Ave, and walk 7 blocks.
name: Big Beautiful Space in Brooklyn - Next to Subway!
review:
Sehr schöne Wohnung in einer guten Lage. Die U-Bahn ist nur ca. 5 Min. weg.
Im direkten Umfeld findet man tolle Cafes/Bars . 
Michael war ein toller Gastgeber. Unser Flug hatte 1,5h Verspätung, dieses war auch kein Problem für Ihn. Er hat uns super empfangen und uns alles gezeigt. Die Wohnung war wie beschrieben.  
Wir können es nur empfehlen.
